title: Remco Evenepoel rumors and a floundering Tour de France: What’s going on at Quick-Step?
content:
With Soudal Quick-Step on course for its worst Tour in a decade, the pressure's on to keep 'Project Remco' a reality for 2024.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel rumors and a floundering Tour de France: What’s going on at Quick-Step? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
